title: Does someone know this font?
content:
hello to everybody,  
does someone know this font?  
really sorry for the low quality of the image and tahnks in andvace.

tommi

 [‹ Two caps for blackletter fiends](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022656/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49888 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need to know this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022656/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49880 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tommi

comments.content: What’s the source for this image?

hi Miss Tiffany,  
I found the font in a Poe book cover. This is the title of the novel.  
Does it suggest anything?

t

I’d say: not a font.  
There are a few font suggestions for a related style in [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022656/http:/typophile.com/node/47531) – though none of them will bring you really close.  
F

yes Florian,  
I tought this is not a font, but great thanks for the list.  
I’ll try to modify one of those.  
t
